text:
<!everyone> happy friday folks!
---
just a reminder that we've got an AMA coming up in ~20 minutes with <@U02EG84B5UL>! more details in the post above. hope to see you in <#C014P2BJLER|ask-me-anything> at 1pm ET :partying_face:
---
one other quick thing: i <https://content-career-growth.slack.com/archives/CN9UCQ92A/p1630509502060700|mentioned a partnership with Miro> a few weeks back and this is now a reality :sunglasses: this is mostly for our freelance folks. get a free account for yourself (for 1 year) and free accounts for your clients. <https://miro.com/professional-network/apply/?utm_source=superpath&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=community&utm_name=partnership&utm_content=apply|use this link to signup>. (we have some Miro folks in this group. thanks to you folks for making this happen!)
---
okay, jobs! including 6 new ones posted this week:
---
*## featured full-time roles:*
---
• Oyster is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/172422-product-marketing-manager-oyster|Product Marketing Manager> (really cool content-adjacent role)
• Lokalise is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/167649-content-marketing-lead-lokalise|Content Marketing Lead>
• Verblio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/167776-senior-product-marketing-specialist-verblio-accelerator-verblio|Senior Product Marketing Specialist> (w/ a video Q&A :tv:)
• Hubspot is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/160604-senior-marketing-manager-strategic-partner-marketing-startups-hubspot|Senior Marketing Manager, Strategic Partner Marketing, Startups> (now with a video Q&A, very cool role focused on VCs/startups)
• Ascend is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/141859-content-director-ascend|Content Director> (now with a video Q&A, awesome mission to empower women in their careers)
• Nira is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/159188-inbound-marketing-specialist-nira|Inbound Marketing Specialist> (now with a video Q&A, work with hiten shah and marie prokopets)
• Quietly Inc is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/161765-content-manager-editorial-quietly-inc|Content Manager, Editorial> (very cool agency opportunity)
• Campfire Labs is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/29028-account-manager-campfire-labs|Account Manager> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/29030-staff-writer-campfire-labs|Staff Writer> (:wave: <@U02C74ZGGG0>)
• First National Realty Partners is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/158132-content-manager-first-national-realty-partners|Content Manager> (:wave: <@U01MV98FQAY>)
• Inai is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/154610-lead-copywriter-remote-inai|Lead Copywriter ( Remote)>
• Stratabeat is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/147950-seo-and-content-specialist-stratabeat|SEO & Content Specialist>
• KNIME AG is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/147494-b2b-content-marketing-writer-austin-knime-ag|B2B Content Marketing Writer> (:wave: <@UKQLFSX7H>)
• Animalz is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/142870-content-marketing-editor-animalz|Content Marketing Editor>, <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/139176-senior-content-recruiter-animalz|Senior Recruiter>, <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19186-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Content Marketing Manager>, <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/19184-technical-content-marketing-manager-animalz|Technical Content Marketing Manager> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/167707-content-marketing-intern-paid-animalz|paid intern>
• Stone Press is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/139302-product-researcher-stone-press|Product Researcher>
• Shopify is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/164788-senior-content-marketing-manager-product-shopify|Senior Content Marketing Manager, Product> and a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/159187-content-marketer-shopify|Content Marketer>
---
*freelance projects:*
• Fitt Insider is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/173103-social-and-newsletter-writer-fitt-insider|Social & Newsletter Writer>
• NeuralText is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/170081-content-marketer-neuraltext|Content Marketer>
• Rainforest QA is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/169384-technical-ish-freelance-writer-for-a-funded-b2b-saas-rainforest-qa|Technical-ish Freelance Writer>
• Clearbit is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/163608-freelance-writer-editor-clearbit|Freelance writer / editor> (:wave: <@UJ2MPBP7V>)
• Ardent Growth is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/151421-freelance-writer-ardent-growth|freelance writer> (:wave: <@U01P13NTGG6>)
---
*and more from the job board:*
---
• Sprout Social is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/173105-content-strategist-sprout-social|Content Strategist> (:wave: <@URB31QKM4>)
• Thinkific is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/173174-content-marketing-strategist-thinkific|Content Marketing Strategist>
• Siege Media is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/172425-content-marketing-manager-siege-media|Content Marketing Manager>
• Textio is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/172424-content-marketing-manager-textio|Content Marketing Manager>
• SEOMonitor is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/172237-content-specialist-seomonitor|Content Specialist> (:wave: <@URLKJLWKS>)
• Butter is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/170881-content-lead-butter|Content Lead>
• Webflow is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/165713-content-marketing-manager-webflow|Content Marketing Manager>
• Awesome Motive Inc. is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/161371-content-marketing-team-lead-remote-awesome-motive-inc|Content Marketing Team Lead (Remote)>
• Monte Carlo is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/164801-head-of-product-marketing-monte-carlo|Head of Product Marketing>
• Drop Ship Lifestyle is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/162829-content-marketing-manager-drop-ship-lifestyle|Content Marketing Manager>
• Finch is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/161782-content-marketing-manager-finch|Content Marketing Manager>
• FullStory is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/159885-content-marketing-manager-fullstory|Content Marketing Manager>
• On The Map, Inc. is hiring an <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/161228-seo-director-on-the-map-inc|SEO Director>
• Databox is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/156165-product-content-marketer-databox|Product Content Marketer> (:wave: <@UJ2MQ8SRH>)
• Miro is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/154672-content-marketing-manager-miro|Content Marketing Manager>
• Staffbase is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/145749-head-of-content-staffbase|Head of Content> (:wave: <@UJ420S7MG>)
• Muck Rack is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/142576-senior-product-designer-muck-rack|Senior Product Designer>
• i-Sight is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/139225-content-marketing-manager-i-sight|Content Marketing Manager>
• Toggl is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/135428-content-marketing-manager-toggl|Content Marketing Manager> (:wave: <@UJG4WTGKS>)
• Podia is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/134938-content-marketing-writer-remote-podia|Content Marketing Writer (Remote)> (:wave: <@UJWJLLD63>)
• Advance B2B is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/131732-saas-content-marketing-strategist-advance-b2b|SaaS Content Marketing Strategist>
• Printful is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/121688-german-content-marketing-specialist-printful-custom-printing-sl|German Content Marketing Specialist>
• Stacker is hiring a <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/114045-senior-account-manager-content-marketing-stacker|Senior Account Manager, Content Marketing> (:wave: <@U023UCTKZ5J>, w/ a video Q&A)
have a great weekend!
jimmy

text: I find this interesting - that the Oyster PMM gig - is viewed content adjacent. The description piqued my interest - but  once I clicked and read it, this sounds an awful lot like what I would expect when hiring a PMM (Product Marketing Manager). This is coming from a place of curiosity more than anything else - am I missing something?
